nodes.bodyText:
Getting the principal domain will require me to start the timer after the principal is authenticated (so not when creating the context).
For now, I've decided to leave this out along with the request domain.
This will only affect implementers that get the tags at the start of the timer (we send all arguments when stopping the timer)

Please note that I have changed the caller from "getaccessext" to "getresourceaccessext". Unlike the call in ZMS, putServiceIdentitySystemMeta, there is no call to verifyAuthorizedServiceOperation so this should affect anything.

Unlike the other methods, I didn't change the caller as the name of the method "putServiceIdentitySystemMeta" is different than the caller "putservicesystemmeta". Changing this will break the call to verifyAuthorizedServiceOperation as it appears differently in authorized_services.json file
